pl.bristleback.server.bristle.action
Class ActionMessageFactory

java.lang.Object
  pl.bristleback.server.bristle.action.ActionMessageFactory

public final class ActionMessageFactory
extends java.lang.Object

This factory class contains methods used to create various types of server action messages.

Created on: 2012-08-18 08:48:38

Author:
Wojciech Niemiec
See Also:
BristleMessage

Method Summary
static
<T> BristleMessage<T>
createDefaultMessage(java.lang.String actionClass, T payload)
          Creates a default action message with action class name and payload defined, that can be then sent using ConditionObjectSender.

Method Detail

createDefaultMessage

public static <T> BristleMessage<T> createDefaultMessage(java.lang.String actionClass,
                                                         T payload)
Creates a default action message with action class name and payload defined, that can be then sent using ConditionObjectSender.

Type Parameters:
T - payload type.
Parameters:
actionClass - action class name.
payload - message payload.
Returns:
server action message.

createMessage

public static <T> BristleMessage<T> createMessage(java.lang.String actionClass,
                                                  java.lang.String action,
                                                  T payload)
Creates an action message with action name and payload defined, that can be then sent using ConditionObjectSender.

Type Parameters:
T - payload type.
Parameters:
actionClass - action class name.
action - ation name.
payload - message payload.
Returns:
server action message.
